attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to prevent the closure HMS Gannet in Prestwick.”
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the closure of HMS Gannet at Prestwick, and the move to Glasgow. Keep HMS Gannet at Prestwick.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to prevent the closure HMS Gannet in Prestwick.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=HMSGannet


Her Majesty's Government
